CustomField.defaultValue: "Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions you may have."
CustomField.description: Free text field to provide notes which should be included on the proposal. The proposal is a separate document (visualforce page) generated from Salesforce by choosing a button on the program. Field Type: IA Integrated: Y
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Free text field to provide notes which should be included on the proposal. The proposal is a separate document (visualforce page) generated from Salesforce by choosing a button on the program.
CustomField.label: Proposal Notes
